thread.title: Allu Arjun visits Tirumala with family
thread.title_full: Allu Arjun visits Tirumala with family

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE. |
title: Allu Arjun visits Tirumala with family
text:
Allu Arjun along with his wife Sneha and kids visited Tirumala on Monday. Allu Arjun along with his wife Sneha and kids visited Tirumala on Monday. After his daughter’s birth, the actor wished to visit Lord Venkateswara. Allu’s parents also accompanied him on this trip. “Allu Arjun and his wife offered their three-month-old daughter Arha’s hair during their visit to Tirumala,” says a source close to the actor.
The actor is busy with the film DJ: Duvvada Jagannatham directed by Harish Shankar, where Arjun plays a Brahmin cook (Vanta brahmadu). Shooting is on at a brisk pace and the unit is all set to leave for Belooru, Karnataka. “The team is planning to shoot a few important scenes with Pooja Hegde, after which, others too will join in,” added the source.
